title: How to complete an associate degree in radiologic technology in less than a year - Quora

response.answer_text: If you already have a college degree, it is possible enough credits might transfer in to reduce your time necessary down to about a year. But without this, the answer would be a no. Degrees that take up to one year are Certificates. That’s not the same as a certificate of completion, which simply means you successfully completed a course. Certificates are actual degrees that are one step below the Associates. And they have a series of courses that are part of the degree program.
